channel.title: Weapons Missing Bug
channel.description:
description:
The game removes all but a few of my weapons on map change
repro:
1. Start up bm_c2a4h (last map of QE) 2. Take the door at the end of the map which goes to c2a5a (first map of ST) which is located directly in front of you at (setpos -249.156311 -5535.410156 -358.125793;setang 3.358535 -87.349045 0.000000) 3. Move backwards so that the last map of QE loads again 4. You now only have a crowbar, glock, magnum and satchels (assuming you had any to begin with). My shotgun, MP5, Tau, and Crossbow are all gone
The only fix is to load an earlier save, or to give yourself the weapons manually.
To do that, type "give <weaponname>" in console.
The relevant weapons names are:
weapon_glock weapon_shotgun weapon_mp5 weapon_tau weapon_crossbow weapon_357 weapon_satchel
